items.sentence: Tom accused me of stealing his grandfather\'s antique watch.
Tom insisted on staying to help us clean up after the party.
Tom is going to make mistakes just like everybody else does.
The driver opened the door to let passengers get on the bus.

I\'ve already gained back all the weight I lost last summer.

If you\'d been there, we would\'ve had a good time together.
I became friends with Tom because we sat next to each other.
I can\'t believe Tom did all of this without anyone\'s help.
